title: The Arctic Fox by Natalie Miles
description: The Arctic Fox by Natalie Miles. Read by David Hounslow from the BBC Radio Drama Company. A Top 50 shortlisted story from BBC Radio 2's 500 WORDS 2015 competition, in the 9 and Under category.
